Articles.Content:
That's right folks I landed on the planet Jool! If you don't believe me go here and check out these screen shots for your self. http://imgur.com/a/JkZGp

Upon landing I took some pics and then EVA'd. I'll tell you what, I don't think Squad really intended any one to land on Jool, because right when I EVA'd Jebidia (Sorry for miss spell of his name) started bouncing around the surface. I let this go on for about 5 minutes, partly because I was laughing so hard. But I couldn't get back to my ship so I decided to end the flight there and post this thread in hopes you all can share in the fun.

-Entdude

Edited October 3, 2012 by entdude2
